summary: Splits a multi‑class label image into two separate outputs: a binary (or original‑value) mask for a specified target class and a label map containing all remaining classes grouped under an "others" key. Supports optional minimum object size filtering, custom value for the others class, and conversion to binary masks.
business_intent: Enables downstream analysis or model training that requires isolated focus on a single anatomical or cellular structure while preserving the context of all other structures, commonly used in medical imaging segmentation pipelines.
